data.name: Gold Rate Live
data.description: Android app showing live gold rates using real-time APIs. Built with MVVM architecture and integrated AdMob for monetization.

data.name: Software Update Utility
data.description: A utility Android app to check updates for installed applications. Integrated ads, background service, and RecyclerView listing.

data.name: Offline Maps
data.description: Offline map navigation app built with Mapbox SDK. Supports offline caching and location tracking without internet.

data.name: JS Bank
data.description: Digital banking app offering full-stack wallet features including bill payments, QR payments, biometric verification (BVS SDK), and clean architecture with Jetpack Compose.

data.name: Zindigi
data.description: Digital banking app offering full-stack wallet features including bill payments, QR payments, biometric verification (BVS SDK), and clean architecture with Jetpack Compose.

data.name: Bank Islami App
data.description: Contributed to core modules of Bank Islamiâ€™s mobile banking app, including secure login, payment flows, and API layer refactoring using MVVM and Jetpack components.

data.name: Aik Digital Wallet
data.description: Worked on wallet onboarding, user KYC, and secure transaction flows. Integrated Firebase, biometric login, and in-app notifications.

data.name: WebRTC Audio/Video Call App
data.description: A personal learning project using WebRTC to implement peer-to-peer audio and video calling. Developed a custom signaling server using WebSockets and implemented media stream handling in Android using Kotlin.

data.name: DevOps CI/CD Pipeline for Android
data.description: Implemented a Jenkins-based CI/CD pipeline that automatically builds Android APKs and pushes code to the repository. Included steps for unit testing, code quality checks, versioning, and secure deployment to internal Play Store tracks.
